pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo gihiveyyāvaccaṁ karonti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:1.3_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:1.8_0: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo gihiveyyāvaccaṁ karissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:1.10_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:2.1.6_0: agārikassa yāguṁ vā bhattaṁ vā khādanīyaṁ vā pacati,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc44:2.2.5_0: attano veyyāvaccakarassa yāguṁ vā bhattaṁ vā khādanīyaṁ vā pacati, sāṭakaṁ vā veṭhanaṁ vā dhovati,
